head.title: Does a Missile Shield Make Sense?

hedline.hl1: Does a Missile Shield Make Sense?

abstract.p: Tom Smith letter says failure to develop fully operational missile defense system after spending billions of dollars does not argue for abandoning effort (S)

block.p: Frances FitzGerald's concession of ''the increasingly real threat of an accidental launch'' by the Russians or a possible intentional launching by a rogue nation would seem to argue in favor of a need for at least a limited missile defense (Op-Ed, June 4).

The failure to develop a fully operational defense system after spending billions of dollars does not argue for its abandonment, just as the failure to develop a cure for cancer after the time and billions spent call for its search to be abandoned.
